data.name: Darkblaze Dragon
data.desc: If this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard: Its ATK and DEF become double its original ATK and DEF. If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK.

card_sets.set_name: Rise of the Dragon Lords Structure Deck
Rise of the True Dragons Structure Deck
